projects.title: Ft_transcendence
projects.bodyText: - A modern online gaming platform built with Django and React, featuring real-time multiplayer games, chat system, and comprehensive user management.

projects.title: Inception - Containerized WordPress Stack
projects.bodyText: - A Docker-based WordPress application with NGINX, MariaDB, and bonus services including Redis, FTP, Adminer, and a static website.

projects.title: CPP Modules - 1337
projects.bodyText: - This repository contains C++ programming exercises organized into different modules, each focusing on specific C++ concepts and features.

projects.title: Ft_IRC - Internet Relay Chat Server
projects.bodyText: - A complete IRC (Internet Relay Chat) server implementation in C++ that supports multiple concurrent clients, channel-based communication, and standard IRC protocol compliance.

projects.title: MiniTalk
projects.bodyText: - Demonstrates low-level process communication by encoding text messages as binary data transmitted bit-by-bit through signals..

projects.title: Cub3D - 3D Raycasting Engine
projects.bodyText: - A 3D maze navigation system that renders first-person perspective environments from 2D map files using classic raycasting algorithms, similar to early 3D games like Wolfenstein 3D.

projects.title: Mini_shell
projects.bodyText: - A simplified Unix shell implementation written in C that provides a command-line interface for executing system commands, managing environment variables, and handling basic shell operations.

projects.title: Philosophers - Dining Philosophers Problem
projects.bodyText: - A multi-threaded simulation of the classic dining philosophers problem implemented in C using POSIX threads and mutexes.

projects.title: So_long First 2d game project
projects.bodyText: - A 2D game project developed as part of the 42 School curriculum. The game is built using the MLX graphics library and implements a simple collectible-based gameplay where the player navigates through a map to collect items and reach the exit.

projects.title: Push_Swap
projects.bodyText: - A 42 School project that implements an efficient sorting algorithm using two stacks and a limited set of operations.

projects.title: GetNextLine
projects.bodyText: - A C library for reading lines from file descriptors, supporting both single and multiple file descriptor operations.

projects.title: Ft_printf
projects.bodyText: - This project is a custom implementation of the standard C printf function. The goal is to gain a deeper understanding of how variadic functions work in C by recreating the behavior of printf from scratch.

projects.title: Libft.a
projects.bodyText: - Write your own library, containing an extract of important functions for your cursus.
